name: We Are Screwed!
description:
We Are Screwed! is a chaotic couch co-op space action game for 1-4 players. You are the crew of the worst space vessel in the known galaxy, and you must operate, manage, and repair your spaceship on a crazy-hilarious journey to save the universe!

Grab your friends, sharpen your piloting skills, operate turrets and weird machinery, discover mysteries, and explore the unknown - and try not to screw up!

You are destined to boldly go where no one has screwed up before. To failure and beyond!

KEY FEATURES

  • 1-4 player space co-op action
  • Help your friends by dropping into a local multiplayer session at any time
  • Simple controls
  • Control a spaceship and all of its stations
  • Dynamic splitscreen showing inside and outside
  • Beat bosses, and unlock items, upgrades and more!

ROCK THE UNIVERSE


Team up with up to 3 more friends, unlock a ton of priceless characters and screw up the universe - or save it. Either way, you need to work together to survive in this chaotic local multiplayer!

OPERATE A SPACE SHIP


You maintain a space ship, and complete missions in the scrapyard of the galaxy. You fearlessly face dangerous encounters because you and your team agreed on who is going to pilot the ship, operate the turrets, and repair the ship - or wait - will it lead to complete chaos? Come up with strategies - or just be faster than your friend!

IMPROVE YOUR VESSEL


Discover crazy tools, items, and modules to upgrade your dream spacecraft. Prepare your team for epic boss battles!

DON'T SCREW UP!


Coordinate your team, prevent disasters, and explore old derelicts in the backyard of our galaxy. Can you save the universe this time?

CHOOSE YOUR DESTINY


The universe in We Are Screwed! is procedurally generated - every run is different, and together with your team, you decide where to go next!
